message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
You met me in the middle, now I'll meet you at the edge!
You're trying to push me to the edge, but I'll stay in the middle
You're still stuck in the middle, time to move up!
You're trying to move me up, but I'll stay flexible
You're getting desperate, time to make a final offer!
You're getting aggressive, but I'm not going down without a fight
This is my last offer, take it or leave it!
You're trying to strong-arm me, but I'm not budging
This is my final offer, take it or leave it, literally!
I'll take nothing rather than accept this insult
